revised_title: Julian Sorell Huxley: A Pioneering Biologist and Educator
tldr: This biographical memoir of Julian Sorell Huxley highlights his significant contributions to the fields of biology, zoology, and genetics. Huxley was a prolific writer, teacher, and lecturer, known for his work in bird-watching, laboratory research, and the study of evolution. He was a strong advocate for education and popularizing science, making significant impacts on both the academic and public spheres.
